changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO global_property (property, property_value, uuid) VALUES ('emrapi.sqlSearch.admissionsWithoutCV', '', uuid());

changeSet.author: Ramses
changeSet.sql:
update global_property set property_value = " select distinct concat(pn.given_name, ' ', ifnull(pn.family_name, ' ')) as name, pi.identifier as identifier, p.uuid as uuid, v.uuid as activeVisitUuid, 'true' as hasBeenAdmitted
from visit v inner join patient_identifier pi on v.patient_id = pi.patient_id inner join person_name pn on pi.patient_id = pn.person_id inner join person p on p.person_id = pi.patient_id inner join visit_type vt on v.visit_type_id = vt.visit_type_id
inner join encounter e on e.visit_id = v.visit_id inner join obs o on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id inner join concept_set cs on cn.concept_id = cs.concept_id inner join concept_name csn on csn.concept_id = cs.concept_set
where p.voided IS FALSE and vt.name = 'IPD' and v.date_stopped is null
and csn.name like 'TR, Admission - Informations g%n%rales' and not csn.voided and csn.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and csn.locale = 'fr'
and cn.name = 'Date d''admission' and not cn.voided and cn.concept_name_type = 'SHORT' and cn.locale = 'fr'
and o.value_datetime is not null and o.value_datetime < now() - interval 71 hour and not o.voided
and not exists ( select 1 from encounter e1 inner join obs o1 on e1.encounter_id = o1.encounter_id inner join concept_name cn1 on o1.concept_id = cn1.concept_id where e1.visit_id = v.visit_id and cn1.name in ('Charge Virale HIV - Value', 'Charge Virale - Value(Bilan de routine IPD)') and not cn1.voided and cn1.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and cn1.locale = 'fr'
and o1.value_numeric is not null and not o1.voided ) order by pi.identifier;" where property= 'emrapi.sqlSearch.admissionsWithoutCV';
